name: Yakunat
greetingText: You're the absolute Love of my life
wishText: May God direct your ways in this New year. I wish you success in everything you do! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! my baby!!!! Many many happy returns...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Thank you for being a big part of my life. I adore you baby
replayText: click, if you want to watch it again.
